# Kotlin Ktor Arrow Project

This is a Kotlin project using Ktor framework with Arrow for functional programming and Redis as a backend.

## Project Stack
- Kotlin with Gradle (Kotlin DSL)
- Ktor framework for REST API
- Arrow library for functional programming
- Redis (Lettuce client) for backend storage

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional programming concepts with Arrow
- Handle errors using Either and Option types
- Use Arrow's IO for side effects
- Follow immutable data patterns
- Use Mocks for testing services

## Agent guidelines
- re-use existing terminal instead of opening new ones
- Don't suggest terminal commands, instead show me the code changes directly
- store any documentation in .md files in the ai_reports/ folder
